meta.name: description
meta.content: Ocean Springs School District serves students in Ocean Springs, Mississippi, and is the #2 ranked school district in the state.

li.a: E. H. Keys Alternative Education Center
OSSD Career and Technical Education Center

div.div: (UPDATED: 3:33pm - 3/16/2020) We have added more helpful information to our Health Alerts portal on our website. This is where you will find the most up-to-date and thorough information. You can access the portal by clicking the white "Health Alerts Portal" button in the top right of the page.

div.br: OSSD LAUNCHES SUPPLEMENTAL LEARNING PAGE: OSSD has launched a supplemental learning page to use during the school shutdown. This is not designed to replace school but add supplemental learning methods. You can access it from the menu on the left of our health alerts page.

div.div: This meeting will be held virtually at osgreyhounds.live

article.aria-label: 4th Quarter Ends (Day #180)/Last Day for Students/Elementary Report Cards

h3.a: 4th Quarter Ends (Day #180)/Last Day for Students/Elementary Report Cards

div.div: Online Returning Student Registration will be held May 4th -15th. The registration link can be accessed through the Parent Portal

article.aria-label: OSSD Will Hold Board Meeting Via Livestream

h3.a: OSSD Will Hold Board Meeting Via Livestream

div.div: For the Public, OSSD will hold a virtual school board meeting on May 12th at OSSD livestream at osgreyhounds.live. Members of the public who would like to participate in Community Input are being asked to email their name and speaking topic to dturner@ossdms.org before 2:05 PM on April 23, 2020.

The Ocean Springs School District will be closed on April 17th in response to COVID-19. We are committed to the continual support of your child's learning during this time. The District has been working diligently to offer a number of ways to keep students engaged in learning while they are away from school. Click the "Read full story" button below for more information and resources.
